argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | scmatrhmval.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | scmatrhmval.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 3 |  | scmatrhmval.o | |- .1. = ( 1r ` A ) |
| 4 |  | scmatrhmval.t | |- .* = ( .s ` A ) |
| 5 |  | scmatrhmval.f | |- F = ( x e. K |-> ( x .* .1. ) ) |
| 6 |  | scmatrhmval.c | |- C = ( N ScMat R ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_scmatf1 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> F : K -1-1-> C ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_scmatfo | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> F : K -onto-> C ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> F : K -onto-> C ) |
| 10 |  | #P_df-f1o | |- ( F : K -1-1-onto-> C <-> ( F : K -1-1-> C /\ F : K -onto-> C ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 9, 10 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> F : K -1-1-onto-> C ) |
